media:group.media:title: Meta Microvideos
media:group.media:description:
You decide to read the video description and find it predictably meta. It warns you that the video contains major spoilers for The Witness, moderate spoilers for Metal Gear Solid 2, Axiom Verge and Katamari Damacy. It also has spoilers for Matthewmatosis, whatever that means.

The description then goes on to list a series of timestamps correlating to each microvideo. The word microvideo might seem strange to anyone else but you're already acclimated to it from having watched the original Mega Microvideos and its sequel.

[00:00] - Yes You
[03:17] - Clickerbait
[07:11] - How to Enjoy Matthewmatosis
[10:05] - One Purpose of Abstraction
[12:45] - An Esoteric Text on Criticism
[15:57] - Many Years Later
[21:04] - Unrelated
[24:04] - Seven Years Earlier
[29:03} - Mega Microvideos: Revelations
